lead_paragraph: The group of hackers said the attack, which shut down the broadcaster’s digital services for a few hours on Thursday, was intended as a test of its own abilities.
snippet: The group of hackers said the attack, which shut down the broadcaster’s digital services for a few hours on Thursday, was intended as a test of its own abilities.

headline.main: Group Claiming to Oppose ISIS Says It Committed Cyberattack on BBC

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
